description:
While Washinomori players are training, there is a surprise. The Kirino High players pay a visit to Kurokan. Although the qualities of the Washinomori players are really poor,
they`re encourged to follow Kurokan no matter what. While Morioka is vigorously recruiting players for Kirino, Hitomi shows up in the practicing field of Washinomori.
Source: crunchyroll
